title: What countries have the citizens with the highest self-esteem? - Quora

response.answer_text: I Love this question!! I can only answer it in the context of my personal experiences: relationships. But wouldn’t this be a great poll? Hey Quora, FB has polls, and this would be a fun addition to our Q & A’s. I can give you attributes that jump out at me about the men around the world. I think I will adlib from my experience/perception. I will label various traits because they all lead to ‘confidence.’ Israeli: Cocky, confident, focused Arabs: Brave, committed, bold Mexican: Lovers…Just ask any Latin man, they are convinced that they are the best lovers! French: suave, confident that they live in the most advanced culture on the planet. Italians: don’t get me started… just look at their history. Americans: confident in business, country-proud, their culture is the only one that matters however when it comes to travel and language, it’s time for the average American to visit the rest of the world. Indian: watch out for them: they don’t need to be cocky their actions speak louder than any other cultures’ words. They have family values, intelligence, huge hearts, and respect for women (generalizing, I know) and most important, persistence… As far as confidence, look around you, the Indian man can trace his heritage through the centuries, and he/she are quietly taking over the top jobs in medicine and IT all over the world. I would vote them as not only the most intellectual culture but the most confident. They lead by their actions.

You can refer yourself to the Index of happiness published in the World Happiness Report 2018. https://s3.amazonaws.com/happiness-report/2018/WHR_web.pdf Page 23 you see the ranking of each country. Scandinavian countries are at the top. They have socialism system. Education is free, health care is public. Confidence and happiness are related. I’ve been there and the cost of living is expensive.
